Title: Drops Out
Plot: Brass, Catherine, Grissom and Nick work the case of a female victim found in an apartment building with a gun shot wound. Drops becomes a person of interest during the investigation, even though he is still in jail.
GuestStars: Method Man, Anya Monzikova, Omi Vaidya, Nikki Disanto, Grant Sullivan, Octavia Spencer, Terra Jole, Ludo Vika, Cara Santana, Al Shearer
